thoughts: Is in awe of how fast {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} family has grown
Is taken aback by the intensity of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} love
Can't think of anything cuter than {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new kits
Looks forward to every little moment to come
Can barely stand to be separate from the new litter
Is fascinated by how small {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new kitten's paws are
Gushes over every noise {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} kit is making
Enjoys some very special family moments
Remembers what a full night of sleep used to feel like
Realizes how much work kits can be
Needs a moment away from the new litter
Asks r_c to watch over the kits
